Meta.title: Christmas Red Saber - Custom Adventurer
Meta.author: Drakeny
Meta.description:
It's that time of the year... Time to PADORU!
[h2]Features[/h2] [b]She spins![/b] [b]She sings![/b] [b]She gifts![/b] [i]Only once a year. (in-game year)[/i] [b]She will wreck you in a duel.[/b] [spoiler] Probably. [/spoiler]
[h2]Features[/h2] - Safe to Install and Uninstall on existing saves - You might need to talk to her a couple of times before she decides to give you a present. - If you receive her present and leave the game without saving she'll not give more presents. [b]You ungrateful brat.[/b] [spoiler] Although, she might reconsider it if you delete the .json file in the mod folder. [/spoiler]
